name: Super Mario Bros. 3mix
overview:
Super Mario Bros. 3Mix is a large-scale hack that changes and adds lots of features to Super Mario Bros. 3, and pays homage to many past and future Mario titles, while attempting to remain faithful in spirit to the look and feel of Super Mario Bros. 3.

All new levels, new songs, play as Mario, Luigi, or Toad, new power-ups, enemies and more!
